CREATE TABLE transaction (Id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, datCreatedDate DATE, txtCreatedByUser TEXT, datUpdatedDate DATE, txtUpdatedByUser TEXT, blnIsValid BOOLEAN, intEntitlementId INTEGER, txtFileSource TEXT, datTransactionDate DATE, txtUniqueBusinessKey TEXT, txtInstitutionTransactionId TEXT, txtAccountType TEXT, txtAccountName TEXT, txtAccountNumber TEXT, txtInstitutionName TEXT, txtMerchantName TEXT, txtMerchantCategory TEXT, txtMerchantStreetAddress TEXT, txtMerchantCity TEXT, txtMerchantState TEXT, txtMerchantZip TEXT, txtMerchantCountry TEXT, txtTransactionOriginalName TEXT, txtTransactionOriginalNameClean TEXT, txtTranNameOrig TEXT, txtTranName TEXT, txtTranName2 TEXT, fltAmount FLOAT, txtTransactionType TEXT, txtCategory TEXT, fltCashFlowMultiplier FLOAT, txtCategoryOld TEXT, txtCheckNumber TEXT, txtNote TEXT, txtIgnore TEXT, txtTaxDeductible TEXT);

CREATE TABLE categorymap (Id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, datCreatedDate DATE, txtCreatedByUser TEXT, datUpdatedDate DATE, txtUpdatedByUser TEXT, blnIsValid BOOLEAN, intEntitlementId INTEGER, intCategoryId INTEGER, txtTransactionDescriptionContains TEXT, fltAmountIsEqualTo FLOAT, fltAmountIsGreaterThan FLOAT, fltAmountIsLessThan FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE manualupdates (Id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, datCreatedDate DATE, txtCreatedByUser TEXT, datUpdatedDate DATE, txtUpdatedByUser TEXT, blnIsValid BOOLEAN, intEntitlementId INTEGER, txtUniqueBusinessKey TEXT, txtFieldToUpdate TEXT, txtNewValue TEXT);

CREATE TABLE category (Id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, datCreatedDate DATE, txtCreatedByUser TEXT, datUpdatedDate DATE, txtUpdatedByUser TEXT, blnIsValid BOOLEAN, intEntitlementId INTEGER, txtCategory TEXT, txtCategoryParent TEXT, txtCategoryType TEXT);
